title: "Alphabet Updated With 15 Exciting New Replacement Letters"
content:
[Alphabet Updated With 15 Exciting New Replacement Letters](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820081355/http:/www.theonion.com/content/news/alphabet_updated_with_15_exciting)  
Onion makes type bigtime :-)
author: dezcom

comments.content:
Clearly. out of touch. Sorry for my duplication :-/

ChrisL
With English language it is easy to make new words. Is MONALISA'englished.

Stunning, awesome and I am &%$()!@$% for lack of a better word.

Michael

Just checked my calendar, it's not April 1st. I don't get the joke.

Nick Cooke
What's the exciting new replacement for The Onion?
At the Onion, it's April 1st all year 'round.
